summary: DT: CONSUMER STATES THAT HER 2000 FORD EXPEDITION WAS PARKED FOR NO MORE THAN A HALF AN HOUR AND  VEHICLE CAUGHT ON FIRE.  THEY  PUT FIRE OUT WITH WATER.  THEY THOUGHT IT WAS BECAUSE THEY CHANGED A FUSE, BUT WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER, THEY TOLD THEM THEY DIDN'T KNOW WHY IT HAPPENED.  CONSUMER WAS REPORTING THIS  BECAUSE OF THE RECENT REPORT OF FORD PROBLEMS.*AK
